name: Companeons Whitelist Token
description: The Companeons Whitelist Token (WL-COMP) is a special-access SPL token used to secure guaranteed mint rights during the Companeons NFTs whitelist phase. Holding this token grants eligibility to mint 1 Companeon NFT ahead of the public sale. Each WL-COMP token is redeemable for one mint allocation and is automatically burned upon use. Designed for early supporters, partners, and active community members, WL-COMP ensures a fair, transparent, and bot-resistant NFT distribution process during the whitelist round.
